directions: Combine lemon juice, molasses, garlic, and Worcestershire sauce and mix together.
Pour the marinade over the chicken thighs and let sit for at least one hour.
Remove chicken from marinade and reserver the marinade
Add chicken to a baking dish, that has been sprayed with cooking spray.
Sprinkle the chicken with salt and pepper and pour the marinade over the chicken.
Cook that chicken for 20 minutes basting occasionally with the marinade. Then bake the chicken till done with out basting.
4466.ingredients:
1/3 teaspoon
                            - black pepper 
 8 whole
                            - chicken thighs skinless
 4 whole
                            - garlic cloves choppped
 1/3 teaspoon
                            - kosher salt 
 1/3 cup
                            - lemon juice 
 2 1/2 tablespoons
                            - molasses 
 2 1/2 teaspoons
                            - worcestershire sauce
4466.title: Lemon Garlic Chicken

directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees, or start the grill
Stir together the salt, pepper, cumin, chile powder, and cinnamon, then coat the port with the spice rub.
Heat 1 tablespoon of the olive in in a skillet over medium high heat and brown pork, turning about 4 minutes (unless you are going to cook on the grill then skip this step)
Stir together the brown sugar, garlic, and tabasco sauce and pat onto the top of the tender loin. Place the pork in a roasting pan, or on the grill and cook for 20 minutes.
6845.ingredients:
1/4 teaspoon
                            - black pepper 
 1/4 cup
                            - brown sugar 
 1/2 teaspoon
                            - chili powder 
 1/2 teaspoon
                            - cinnamon 
 1/2 teaspoon
                            - cumin ground
 1/2 teaspoon
                            - garlic finely chopped
 1/2 teaspoon
                            - kosher salt 
 2 teaspoons
                            - olive oil 
 16 ounces
                            - pork tenderloin sliced into chops
 1/2 tablespoon
                            - tabasco sauce
6845.title: Island Pork Tenderloin

directions: Grill or bake chicken breast for 20 minutes or till done.
Cool and slice chicken breast into thin strips
Place tortilla in microwave between two paper towels and cook for 10 seconds.
Remove warmed tortilla and put chicken, chopped tomatoes, cilantro, red onion, lettuce, avocado, and sour cream into tortilla and roll it up.
7416.ingredients:
1/4 whole
                            - avocado 
 4 tablespoons
                            - cilantro chopped
 1 cup
                            - iceberg lettuce shreaded
 1/2 whole
                            - red onion diced
 2 whole
                            - skinless chicken breast 
 2 tablespoons
                            - sour cream low fat
 1 cup
                            - tomatos diced
 2 whole
                            - wheat tortillas
7416.title: Grilled Chicken Burrito
